comments.body:
There's a couple of missing properties.
* `user` , I recommend describing the whole property but if it's too much work `object` type will work as well.
* `update_datetime`.
* `create_datetime`.
* `title`.
`translate` only returns `GIF Object` and `Meta Object` not `pagination`.
`random` only returns `GIF Object` and `Meta Object` not `pagination`.
